title: Extra Wide Comfort Fit Athletic Crew (Mid-Calf) Socks for Men and Women, For Wide Feet Pick your size, Do not size up
description: We recommend size 16-21 sock for shoe size 17 and up, 11-16 for shoe size 12-16 and sizes 8 to 11 for shoe sizes 11 and under.
Extra Wide Comfort socks come in 3 variations (Athletic Crew Sock (MID-CALF), Dress Sock, and Anklet Sock)
Designed for Men with wide feet or any condition where feet, ankles or calfs are wide or swollen. Athletic crew socks are comfortable and made in America!
